definitions.text: disorder resulting from a failure to behave predictably
a mental state characterized by a lack of clear and orderly thought and behavior
a feeling of embarrassment that leaves you confused
an act causing a disorderly combination of elements with identities lost and distinctions blended
examples: the confusion of tongues at the Tower of Babel

definitions.text: a mistake that results from taking one thing to be another
examples: he changed his name in order to avoid confusion with the notorious outlaw
